backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor, serving as a placeholder backend canister with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a high-confidence change to update global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens for a bright red background across light and dark themes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary map describing the purpose and styling of key frontend source files and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Empty global CSS file at the project root, likely unused or superseded by src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that defines the root div and loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component that renders the RoseScentsPage as the entire application view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query, reinitializing when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context, hooks, and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH CSS variables for a bright red theme in light and dark modes, and applying background, text, and serif headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application bootstrap that mounts App with React Query and InternetIdentity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/RoseScentsPage.tsx: Editorial React page presenting multiple rose scent profiles and explanatory factors using cards, icons, and semantic layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors via CSS variables, typography, animations, and dark mode support.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state and feature inventory for an ICP dapp, including schema/versioning metadata and a detailed list of implemented frontend, backend, auth, theming, and content features.
